Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: What sustainable or environmental practices have been implemented?
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result: Based on the provided information, it seems that some of the selected companies are engaged in environmentally friendly initiatives. One company, MicroTerra, has developed on-site water treatment systems using microalgae to transform wastewater into a sustainable protein source and clean water. This solution addresses both water pollution and resource management challenges while providing a valuable product. Another company, Bonumose, is working towards transforming global food systems through the production of healthy alternative sugars like tagatose and allulose. These efforts aim to promote sustainability and reduce the environmental impact of traditional sugar production methods. Although specific details about other companies' sustainable practices are not mentioned, it can be inferred that several of the selected companies might be focusing on various aspects of sustainability and environmental responsibility given the broader focus of the World Economic Forum and the emphasis on innovative solutions for social and environmental challenges.

Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: Are there any events or initiatives focused on environmental conservation? If yet then list 10 such events.
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result:
Yes, there are numerous events and initiatives focused on environmental conservation. However, providing a comprehensive list of 10 such events would be beyond the scope of this response. Instead, I can mention some well-known events and organizations related to environmental conservation:

1. United Nations Climate Change Conferences (COP)
2. World Wildlife Fund (WWF)
3. Conservation International (CI)
4. Greenpeace
5. Earth Day (April 22)
6. CleanUpTheWorld campaigns
7. The IUCN World Parks Congress
8. The Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD)
9. The Bonn Challenge
10. The Paris Agreement

Please note that this list is not exhaustive but rather represents a selection of prominent events and initiatives in the field of environmental conservation.

Impact es un listado seleccionado por aliados de la Fundación Norrsken que reconoce a las organizaciones con mayor impacto sobre las problemáticas más fuertes del mundo Su propósito es destacar el poder del emprendedurismo como motor de cambio La empresa argentina de triple impacto Mamotest una de las 30 Promesas de Forbes de  fue elegida por Impact entre miles de candidatos como uno de una de las  ideas que gracias a su esfuerzo e impacto positivo pueden cambiar el mundo impactando en la vida de  millones de personas Mamotest es la primera healthtech en Latinoamérica que se dedica exclusivamente a reducir la mortalidad del cáncer de mama trabajando desde la concientización y el acceso universal a diagnóstico por imágenes de alta calidad hasta el seguimiento de las pacientes para asegurar que lleguen a un tratamiento personalizado en etapa temprana  El cáncer de mama es el cáncer 1 en el mundo y se lleva casi  vidas por día El 80 de estas muertes ocurren porque las mujeres son

brazo del paciente» En otro panel Pablo Santos HealthCare Informatics Business Leader South Region de Philips habló sobre los retos en materia de digitalización en salud «La madurez digital ayuda a ampliar el acceso de la salud sobre todo a un país como el nuestro tan amplio y con una concentración tan grande en la zona central Después hay un aspecto económico muy importante y hay que ver como reducir costos para ayudar a esa transformación digital» señaló Esas son los dos retos de la empresa destacó «Lo que nos permitirá impactar positivamente en la vida de  millones de personas para el  Al día de hoy tenemos un 70 cumplido ese objetivo Además  millones de esas personas son de comunidades desatendidas algo que nos demuestra cómo la tecnología puede ayudar a ampliar el acceso a la salud reduciendo costos« «Un ejemplo de esto es la telemedicina o el telediagnóstico Philips tiene un ecógrafo portátil que puede conectarse a un teléfono subir las imágenes y que los pacientes tengan acceso

We are the first healthtech company that works daily towards beating breast cancer We raise awareness and provide high quality diagnostic imaging and patient follow-up in order to achieve early diagnosis while making sure no woman feels alone in the processThis task is very close to our hearts and we would like to share it since it’s about caring for women our women This is why we invite companies organizations health centers and governments to join us and lead the way for others to participateWe can all be a part of this cause by joining forces and defeating breast cancer together in October and all year round Head to our HOME page to meet all the organizations that already support us Want to take part There are many ways to do so If this is important to you please contact us It fills my heart with joy to say I am a spokesperson for such an important cause in Mexican women’s lives My dream is to reach more women support them and to raise awareness about having mammograms done to

Commerce & Products.question: What products, services, or technologies are available?
Commerce & Products.result:
Based on the provided information, there are several products, services, and technologies available from various companies. Some examples include:

1. MicroTERRA (Mexico): On-site water treatment systems utilizing microalgae to convert wastewater into clean water and a sustainable protein source.
2. Mission Space (Luxembourg): Satellite-based space weather intelligence systems designed to monitor and predict space weather events.
3. Bonumose (USA): Technologies supporting the affordable production of healthier alternative sugars like tagatose and allulose, aimed at transforming global food systems.
4. TBD (Selected Mexican company): Unknown product, service, or technology offered by the selected Mexican company among the Technology Pioneers.

San Francisco USA 10 May  – The World Economic Forum today welcomes  innovative tech firms to its Technology Pioneers community Full of young and growing tech companies the  cohort is forging new paths in healthcare food production and more with cutting-edge technologies This year’s intake includes Emerge which is improving virtual interactions through the development of a device with tactile effects for users at virtual gatherings Ampd Energy is reshaping the construction industry by pioneering battery energy storage systems and Alife is supporting healthcare advances by using artificial intelligence to improve the success rate of IVF “The  cohort of Technology Pioneers is already bringing great changes to industries around the world” said Saemoon Yoon Technology Pioneers Community Lead World Economic Forum “By joining this community these emerging tech leaders can continue to show not only the impressive tech advancements within their firms but also how their companies are helping to

Commerce & Products.question: Are there any promotional events, expos, or sales for these offerings? If yes, list them.
Commerce & Products.result:
Yes, there are several promotional events, expos, and sales opportunities available for the offerings of the selected tech firms in the World Economic Forum's Technology Pioneers community. These events provide a platform for the companies to showcase their products and services, network with potential clients and partners, and gain visibility among investors. Some notable events include:

1. Annual Meeting of the New Champions (AMNC): Also known as "Summer Davos," AMNC brings together the next generation of leaders from various industries, including technology. Participating companies have the opportunity to present their groundbreaking ideas and initiatives to a diverse audience of global decision-makers.
2. Regional Summits: Throughout the year, the World Economic Forum organizes regional summits in different parts of the world. These events bring together regional stakeholders, including government officials, business leaders, civil society representatives, and academics, providing an excellent opportunity for Technology Pioneers to promote their offerings and establish connections in their respective regions.
3. Exclusive Networking Events: As part of the Global Innovators Community, Technology Pioneers are invited to exclusive networking events hosted by the World Economic Forum. These events facilitate interaction between the company representatives and other influential individuals in business, politics, and society, potentially leading to valuable partnerships and collaborations.
4. Digital Platforms: The World Economic Forum leverages its digital platforms, such as the WEF Agenda blog and social media channels, to highlight the achievements and innovations of Technology Pioneers. By sharing their stories and accomplishments, these companies can increase their visibility and credibility in the marketplace.
5. Collaborative Projects: From time to time, the World Economic Forum may launch joint initiatives or projects involving Technology Pioneers. These collaborations can help promote the companies' offerings and demonstrate their commitment to addressing pressing global challenges.

Commerce & Products.question: What are the key partnerships or collaborations related to commerce?
Commerce & Products.result: There are several notable partnerships and collaborations mentioned in the text that relate to commerce. One of them is MicroTerra, which is based in Mexico and focuses on developing on-site water treatment systems using microalgae to convert wastewater into a sustainable protein source and clean water. This innovative solution has the potential to revolutionize the way we treat and manage wastewater while creating economic opportunities in the process. Another example is Bonumose, a company based in the United States that is working to transform global food systems through the development of technology to produce healthier alternative sugars like tagatose and allulose. By addressing pressing challenges in agriculture and nutrition, both MicroTerra and Bonumose are contributing to the growth and evolution of commerce. Additionally, there are numerous other Technology Pioneers featured in the text who are driving innovation across various sectors, including finance, healthcare, smart cities, and more. These pioneering efforts have the potential to shape the future of commerce and create new opportunities for businesses and consumers alike.

Employment & Opportunities.question: What employment or educational opportunities are currently available?
Employment & Opportunities.result:
Based on the provided information, there seem to be several job openings and educational programs related to technology, innovation, and social impact. Some specific examples include:

1. MicroTERRA (Mexico): They might be looking for professionals in water treatment, algae research, and engineering. Knowledge in sustainability and environmental issues would be beneficial.
2. Mission Space (Luxembourg): Job opportunities could arise in areas like satellite communication, data analysis, and software development. A background in physics, mathematics, or computer science would be advantageous.
3. Bonumose (United States): This company may require experts in biotechnology, sugar chemistry, and process engineering. A strong understanding of biochemical processes and regulatory compliance will be valuable.

In terms of education, attending programs focused on technology, innovation, and social impact can provide valuable skills and networking opportunities. Some options include:

1. Programs offered by universities and business schools specializing in technology, entrepreneurship, and social impact. These programs often provide hands-on learning experiences through internships, projects, and collaborative initiatives.
2. Professional development courses and workshops hosted by organizations like Singularity University, Harvard Global Partners, and others. These events offer opportunities to learn about cutting-edge technologies, network with like-minded individuals, and explore career paths in the technology and innovation sectors.

We are the first healthtech company that works daily towards beating breast cancer We raise awareness and provide high quality diagnostic imaging and patient follow-up in order to achieve early diagnosis while making sure no woman feels alone in the processThis task is very close to our hearts and we would like to share it since it’s about caring for women our women This is why we invite companies organizations health centers and governments to join us and lead the way for others to participateWe can all be a part of this cause by joining forces and defeating breast cancer together in October and all year round Head to our HOME page to meet all the organizations that already support us Want to take part There are many ways to do so If this is important to you please contact us It fills my heart with joy to say I am a spokesperson for such an important cause in Mexican women’s lives My dream is to reach more women support them and to raise awareness about having mammograms done to

Employment & Opportunities.question: What employee or participant benefits are highlighted?
Employment & Opportunities.result:
Throughout the provided text, several employee/participant benefits are mentioned. These include:

1. Patient navigation services: Professional patient navigators like Soledad Orban in Argentina and Dr. Maria Barral Barcena in Mexico provide loving and empathetic support to patients after receiving their results. This helps guide them through the healthcare system and address any concerns related to their diagnosis.
2. Employee wellness programs: By focusing on prevention rather than cure, this organization is transforming the healthcare system to prioritize disease prevention over simply treating patients. This approach not only benefits patients but also promotes a healthier work environment for employees.
3. Digitalization initiatives: Companies like Philips are working towards expanding access to healthcare, particularly in large countries with vast geographical areas such as Argentina. Additionally, these efforts aim to reduce costs and improve efficiency in the healthcare sector, benefiting both patients and healthcare professionals alike.

to offer patient tracking including medical history personal data and information regarding results which improves our system The more mammograms we carry out the more we understand the disease and are closer to defeating it WE ARE TRANSFORMING THE HEALTHCARE SYSTEM FROM ONE THAT CURES PATIENTS TO ONE THAT PREVENTS DISEASES Soledad Orban in Argentina and Dr María Barral Barcena in Mexico are our professional patient navigatorsThey carry out the important role of providing loving and empathetic support to patients once they get their results They focus on guiding our patients through the healthcare system and clearing any doubts they may have upon their diagnosis

brazo del paciente» En otro panel Pablo Santos HealthCare Informatics Business Leader South Region de Philips habló sobre los retos en materia de digitalización en salud «La madurez digital ayuda a ampliar el acceso de la salud sobre todo a un país como el nuestro tan amplio y con una concentración tan grande en la zona central Después hay un aspecto económico muy importante y hay que ver como reducir costos para ayudar a esa transformación digital» señaló Esas son los dos retos de la empresa destacó «Lo que nos permitirá impactar positivamente en la vida de  millones de personas para el  Al día de hoy tenemos un 70 cumplido ese objetivo Además  millones de esas personas son de comunidades desatendidas algo que nos demuestra cómo la tecnología puede ayudar a ampliar el acceso a la salud reduciendo costos« «Un ejemplo de esto es la telemedicina o el telediagnóstico Philips tiene un ecógrafo portátil que puede conectarse a un teléfono subir las imágenes y que los pacientes tengan acceso

San Francisco USA 10 May  – The World Economic Forum today welcomes  innovative tech firms to its Technology Pioneers community Full of young and growing tech companies the  cohort is forging new paths in healthcare food production and more with cutting-edge technologies This year’s intake includes Emerge which is improving virtual interactions through the development of a device with tactile effects for users at virtual gatherings Ampd Energy is reshaping the construction industry by pioneering battery energy storage systems and Alife is supporting healthcare advances by using artificial intelligence to improve the success rate of IVF “The  cohort of Technology Pioneers is already bringing great changes to industries around the world” said Saemoon Yoon Technology Pioneers Community Lead World Economic Forum “By joining this community these emerging tech leaders can continue to show not only the impressive tech advancements within their firms but also how their companies are helping to

Collaboration & Partnerships.question: What organizations, institutions, or entities is the organization collaborating with?
Collaboration & Partnerships.result:
Based on the provided information, it appears that the organization is collaborating with several notable groups and initiatives. These include:

1. Fundación Norrsken (Norrsken Foundation) - A nonprofit foundation focused on supporting individuals and organizations working towards positive social change.
2. Acumen - A nonprofit organization that invests in and supports social enterprises addressing poverty across various sectors like health education water energy and agriculture.
3. The Obama Foundation - An organization founded by former US President Barack Obama and his wife Michelle Obama. It aims to empower people to change their communities and the world through a variety of programs and initiatives.
4. Katapult - An Oslo-based startup hub that focuses on accelerating and scaling early-stage, high-impact ventures in fields like technology sustainability and social good.
6. SoftBank Leaps - A program within the SoftBank Group that invests in and supports innovative startups addressing the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).
7. BMW Foundation - A German nonprofit organization committed to fostering intercultural dialogue and understanding through its educational and research activities.

These organizations represent a diverse range of interests and expertise, highlighting the broad scope of collaboration within the Global Innovators Community.

design development and deployment of new technologies and innovations and are poised to make a significant impact on business and society The community is part of the Global Innovators Community an invitation-only group of game-changing start-up companies In addition the community is also part of the Centres for the Fourth Industrial Revolution Network where members contribute to shaping new policies and strategies in areas such as artificial intelligence blockchain and digital assets the internet of things and autonomous vehicles The Global Innovators Community is a group of the world’s most promising start-ups and scale-ups at the forefront of technological and business model innovation The World Economic Forum provides the community with a platform to engage with public- and private-sector leaders and to contribute new solutions to overcome crises and build future resiliency Companies that are invited to become Global Innovators will engage with one or more of the Forum’s platforms

Collaboration & Partnerships.question: What are the mutual objectives and outcomes expected from these collaborations?
Collaboration & Partnerships.result: Collaborating with other members of the Global Innovators Community and the Centres for the Fourth Industrial Revolution Network, the primary objective for these emerging tech leaders is to contribute new solutions to overcome crises and build future resilience. Through these partnerships, they aim to shape new policies and strategies in areas like artificial intelligence, blockchain, digital assets, the Internet of Things (IoT), and autonomous vehicles. Additionally, they seek to engage with public- and private-sector leaders, providing them with innovative ideas and potential solutions to pressing global challenges. By doing so, these companies hope to establish themselves as thought leaders in their respective fields while making a meaningful impact on business and society.

leaders and to contribute new solutions to overcome crises and build future resiliency Companies that are invited to become Global Innovators will engage with one or more of the Forum’s platforms as relevant to help define the global agenda on key issues

Economic Forum “By joining this community these emerging tech leaders can continue to show not only the impressive tech advancements within their firms but also how their companies are helping to build a better future for us all” For the first time over one-third of the selected firms are led by women well above the industry average With  Tech Pioneers based in 30 countries – with Viet Nam Rwanda and the Czech Republic represented for the first time – this year’s cohort is shaping industries around the world In Mexico for example microTERRA builds on-site water treatment systems with microalgae that transforms wastewater into a sustainable protein source and clean water Luxembourg’s Mission Space develops a satellite-based space weather intelligence system In the United States Bonumose is transforming global food systems with its technology to support the affordable production of healthy alternative sugars such as tagatose and allulose Following their selection as Technology Pioneers

San Francisco USA 10 May  – The World Economic Forum today welcomes  innovative tech firms to its Technology Pioneers community Full of young and growing tech companies the  cohort is forging new paths in healthcare food production and more with cutting-edge technologies This year’s intake includes Emerge which is improving virtual interactions through the development of a device with tactile effects for users at virtual gatherings Ampd Energy is reshaping the construction industry by pioneering battery energy storage systems and Alife is supporting healthcare advances by using artificial intelligence to improve the success rate of IVF “The  cohort of Technology Pioneers is already bringing great changes to industries around the world” said Saemoon Yoon Technology Pioneers Community Lead World Economic Forum “By joining this community these emerging tech leaders can continue to show not only the impressive tech advancements within their firms but also how their companies are helping to
